Package io.github.zero88.jooqx.datatype

Interface DataTypeMapper<V,J,U>

Type Parameters:
V - The Vert.x SQL data type
J - The jOOQ type - i.e. any type available from SQLDataType
U - The user type
All Superinterfaces:
org.jooq.Converter<J,U>, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
UserTypeAsJooqType<V,J>, UserTypeAsVertxType<V,J>
All Known Implementing Classes:
DurationConverter
public interface DataTypeMapper<V,J,U> extends org.jooq.Converter<J,U>
A Mapper for data types.

A general data type conversion interface that can be provided to jOOQ.x at various places in order to perform custom data type conversion.

A mapper is three-way-conversion, this means that the mapper is used among Vert.x SQL datatype (on a specified Vert.x SQL client), jOOQ SQLDataType and user data type

Since:
1.0.0
